/home/luca/opt/openmpi/4.1.2/bin/mpicxx -Wl,-O2 -Wl,--sort-common -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,-z,relro -Wl,-z,now -Wl,--disable-new-dtags -Wl,--gc-sections -Wl,-rpath,/home/luca/miniconda3/lib -Wl,-rpath-link,/home/luca/miniconda3/lib -L/home/luca/miniconda3/lib -L /home/luca/opt/hdf5/1.12.1/lib -L/home/luca/opt/p3dfft/3.1.2/lib -L/home/luca/opt/openmpi/4.1.2/lib CMakeFiles/gpPetsc.dir/ex1.cpp.o -o gpPetsc  -lpetsc -lp3dfft.3 -lstdc++fs -lhdf5 -lfftw3 -lfftw3f -lyaml-cpp -lyaml-cpp
